name: fashion doll beauty salon - makeover game
name_original: fashion doll beauty salon - makeover game
description:
Welcome to the world of Fashion. This game is super fun in which you can prepare models so that they can look better. With fashion stars, top models and fabulous celebrities like makeovers, you have a special make-up and makeover game. You have so many wonderful accessories for your makeover that even will be surprised to such beautiful dresses and makeovers.

Probably the best makeover game out there. Do try out the latest fashion trends and make this fashion doll wow.
